capability.name: Corporate Lease
capability.definition: The Corporate Lease product provides corporate customers with loans to support leasing activity for property and equipment under an umbrella leasing arrangement
capability.role: The Service Domain provides the financing support to support corporate customers with leasing arrangements for property and equipment. The bank will take a collateral interest in the leased items to underwrite the associated loan(s)
capability.example: A corporate customer establishes a corporate leasing facility with the bank to acquire critical production equipment and facilities under lease

key_features.name: Establish corporate leasing facility
key_features.description: Enables establish corporate leasing facility to support the corporate lease product provides corporate customers with loans to support leasing activity for property and equipment under an umbrella leasing arrangement

key_features.name: Process leases under the facility
key_features.description: Enables process leases under the facility to support the corporate lease product provides corporate customers with loans to support leasing activity for property and equipment under an umbrella leasing arrangement

key_features.name: Report, analyze and structure leasing arrangements to optimize the customers financial position
